scripts.sendNpm: tsc && cd ./dist && npm version patch && npm publish --access=public
scripts.gendocs: rm -rf ./docs && mkdir ./docs && mkdir ./etc && tsc && npx api-extractor run --local && api-documenter yaml --input-folder ./temp && node ./dev/gendoc.js && rm -rf etc && rm -rf temp && rm -rf yaml

name: @lunarislab/web3tokens
description: A library for interacting with EVM tokens such as ERC20, ERC721 and ERC1155.
author: iyarsius
